channel.title: [PI] Project SS (Release!) [PI]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pwkCx.gif[/img][/center] [center][b]Where Cold is the new Hot![/b][/center] ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Hello [b]Moparians[/b]! This is my first release, so please keep the flaming to a minimum! I have spent about a two weeks or so on this project, I originally began [i]Project SS[/i] to learn how to code. I know i'm not that great but I have learned a few things along the way. Lets move on to the features, shall we? (I will not list all of them, there is to many!)
[ul][li]Improved slayer system[/li] [li]Clipped following[/li] [li]Combat following[/li] [li]Skillcape emotes[/li] [li]Barrows and effects[/li] [li]Removed donator only items[/li] [li]New home area[/li] [li]Donator's area[/li] [li]Quest Tab teleports[/li] [li]Spirit shields+effects[/li][/ul]
- Divine: deducts 30% of damage - Elysian: 70% chance to deduct 30% of damage - Arcane: +20 magic attack bonus - Spectral: +30 magic defence bonus
If you all must know, I did not implement [b]all[/b] of these features, the ones I did were ripped them from other sources (Most of them anyway). So, with that being said, there will be a v2 in the future with more 'unique' content implemented, so be looking forward to it! Anyway, lets move onto the media, shall we?
[b]Home:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kmcGV.png[/img]
[b]Amulet teleporting:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bg9pU.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LFxyt.png[/img]
[b]Town Crier:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/441Yg.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OlMuU.png[/img]
In [i]Project SS v2[/i] NPC's and items will be the only way of transportation, all teleporting spells will be disabled.
Now time for the almighty link!
[ul][li][url=http://up.ht/SHgAn1]Project SS: Packaged - Uppit[/url][/li][/ul]
Again, I am a new coder and I started this project for [b]learning purposes[/b]! I am always up for tips and tricks to get better!
Feedback is appreciated! :)

item.title: [PI] Project SS (Release!) [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[quote=“SnowStar, post:20, topic:463458”][quote author=Coldmedicine link=topic=566909.msg4125341#msg4125341 date=1350334297]
Kid, this shitty release is a shitty leech of RuneLive, i looked up the cache,
excactly the same,
all u did was change the name, and even that was a shitty job

Please learn atleast a little bit java before you release something.
[/quote]I used RuneLive as a base. I am new to coding so I ripped tons of code from other releases. So instead of flaming why don’t you come up with something better? I laugh at people like you considering I already admitted to ripping 95% of the code. I will get better just give me time. :)[/quote]
you didnt rip anything,
i hosted ur server for 10 min
then runelive,
it was excactly the same…
u just changed the home location, wich isnt a art,
So please come up with a better release next time, or stay away from mopar.

Read full topic

Still the first release and everyone’s gotta start somewhere
[/quote]
You are correct, I wish everyone else would realize that.
Anyways, I know I said I would add more media later on, but I don’t think I will. There is nothing really worth showing, I wasn’t even going to post the media I have now. When v2 is released (approx. 12-14 days) I will most likely have content worth showing-off.

Be looking forward to it. :)[/quote]

Please take more than 2 weeks to make an updated version. Try 2 months at least!

More information/Pics.[/quote]

More pics will be added later on tonight!

Team_Rocket:

Not the worst first release. Thanks for being honest about ripping code. This looks like everything else.

I know, as I get better at coding I hope to be different from everyone else. v2 will be a bit better, I promise!

Thanks for the feedback, guys!

[center]Where Cold is the new Hot![/center]

Hello Moparians! This is my first release, so please keep the flaming to a minimum! I have spent about a two weeks or so on this project, I originally began Project SS to learn how to code.
